related_post.text: Anyways as I was asking is there any library that would understand directly some time instructions (such as 1h30 or 15m)?

so_post.text: @atlas_core a bit of googling gave me <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1495487/isthereanypythonlibraryforparsingdatesandtimesfromanaturallanguage> which seems to suggest a few though it's a bit more complex than what you want.

comments: direcet answer given from SO for question about parsing time and data from string
